title: __init__
overview: Constructor for the Stack data structure.

title: __str__
overview: Returns a string representation of the Stack to display.

title: __repr__
overview: Returns a string representation of the Stack to debug.

title: limit
overview: Sets the Stack's Node object limit.
description: Raises ValueError if value is smaller than the Linked List's size.

title: push
overview: Inserts new data in the Stack.
description: Raises ValueError if data is None.
Raises IndexError if Stack is full.

title: pop
overview: Removes and returns the first item in the Stack.
description: Raises IndexError if Stack is empty.

title: peek
overview: Returns the first item in the Stack without removing it.
description: Raises IndexError if Stack is empty.

title: contains
overview: Returns whether the data is in the Stack.
description: Raises ValueError if data is None.
Raises IndexError if Stack is empty.
Returns True if item is in the Stack.
Returns False if item is not in the Stack.

title: is_empty
overview: Returns whether the Stack is empty.
description: Returns True if Stack is empty.
Returns False if Stack is not empty.
